thread.title: Tesla Charging Stations Installed at Seal Cove Inn, a Half Moon Bay Hotel
thread.title_full: Tesla Charging Stations Installed at Seal Cove Inn, a Half Moon Bay Hotel - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Tesla Charging Stations Installed at Seal Cove Inn, a Half Moon Bay Hotel
text:
Seal Cove Inn
HALF MOON BAY, Calif. , Aug. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Seal Cove Inn has claimed its place as one of the most innovative and forward-thinking Half Moon Bay hotels with its recent installation of an onsite Tesla destination charging station . The partnership between the hotel and Tesla Motors is one of the first of many between the hotel and luxury brands. Seal Cove Inn aims to provide many unique conveniences to suit the preferences and needs of its guests.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150814/258654
About Tesla Destination Charging
In one year, Tesla destination charging stations have grown from a handful to 750 sites world-wide. Their high-power connectors can supply power at 20kW, adding up to 58 miles of range to Model S in an hour. A Model S can be fully recharged in 4-5 hours at the station.
About Seal Cove Inn
Seal Cove Inn is a 30-minute scenic drive from San Francisco . The 10-room boutique hotel near Half Moon Bay has recently undergone an extensive refresh and is serenely situated on a bluff above the Pacific Ocean bordered by the Fitzgerald Marine Reserve . The inn sets itself apart from other Half Moon Bay hotels with direct beach access 500 feet from the front door, warming gas fireplaces, locally made bath products in their signature scent, and the following complimentary items: gourmet breakfast daily, an evening wine reception, locally roasted organic coffee and tea, bottled water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi and a Bluetooth-enabled sound system.
About Tesla
Tesla Motors' goal is to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable transport with a full range of increasingly affordable electric cars. California -based Tesla designs and manufactures electric vehicles as well as EV powertrain components. Tesla has delivered more than 55,000 electric vehicles to customers worldwide.
Contact
To learn more about Seal Cove Inn and the hotel's brand partnerships, please contact:
